text: Andrew Nicholas Castle (born 15 November 1963) is a retired British tennis player. He became a television presenter. He was born in Epsom, Surrey. He retired from tennis in 1992. He was a contestant on the 2008 series of Strictly Come Dancing and on the 2010 series of 71 Degrees North. == Other websites == *Official Website *ATP Tennis Player Profile * * *sports-reference Category:1963 births Category:British male tennis players Category:English television presenters Category:Living people Category:Reality television participants Category:Sportspeople from Surrey Category:Strictly Come Dancing participants Category:Television personalities from Surrey
title: Andrew Castle
